name: part_002
file: tmp_Rushia's last birthday stream るしあさんの最後の誕生日配信 【#潤羽るしあ生誕祭】祝３D LIVE！！with３期生☆【潤羽るしあ-ホロライブ】 [3gRxbBWZAPc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Uruha Rushia performing 'Nainai' (ないない) by ReoNa.
Transition between songs. Shirogane Noel appears on stage to join Rushia.
Uruha Rushia and Shirogane Noel performing 'Ren'ai Circulation' (恋愛サーキュレーション) by Kana Hanazawa.

subtitles.original: 影も形も いっそ失くしてしまえばいい
subtitles.english: I might as well just lose shadow and form altogether.

subtitles.original: またハイ ひとつひとつから始めればいい
subtitles.english: Again, yes, I should just start over one by one.

subtitles.original: ここにいない いない いないのは自分 自分
subtitles.english: The one who is not here, not here, not here is myself, myself.

subtitles.original: 誰も見ない 見ない 見ないまま 空きステでさよなら
subtitles.english: Without anyone seeing, seeing, seeing, goodbye at the empty stage.

subtitles.original: 嬉しくない 悲しくもない 透明な気分
subtitles.english: Not happy, not sad, a transparent feeling.

subtitles.original: 足りない自分 合わせる顔もない
subtitles.english: My insufficient self has no face to show.

subtitles.original: ない ない ないままで ここにいたい いたい
subtitles.english: Just as I am, with nothing, nothing, nothing, I want to be here, be here.

subtitles.original: 笑いたいじゃない
subtitles.english: I want to laugh, don't I?

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: One, two!

subtitles.original: でも そんなんじゃだめ
subtitles.english: But that's not good.

subtitles.original: もう そんなんじゃほら
subtitles.english: Look, that's already no good.

subtitles.original: 心は進化するよ もっともっと
subtitles.english: My heart will evolve, more and more.

subtitles.original: 言葉にすれば消えちゃう関係なら 言葉を消せばいいやって思ってた
subtitles.english: I thought if it was a relationship that would disappear if put into words, then I should just erase the words.

subtitles.original: 恐れてた だけどあれ？ なんか違うかも
subtitles.english: I was afraid, but wait? Something might be different.

subtitles.original: 千里の道も一歩から 石のように固い そんな意志で
subtitles.english: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step, with a will as hard as a stone.

subtitles.original: 塵も積もればやまとなでしこ？ 死ぬ気で いや死ぬ気で！
subtitles.english: If dust piles up, will it become a Yamato Nadeshiko? With all my might, no, with my life on the line!

subtitles.original: ふわふわり ふわふわる あなたが名前を呼ぶ それだけで宙へ浮かぶ
subtitles.english: Fluffy and soft, when you call my name, just that makes me float into the air.

subtitles.original: ふわふわる ふわふわり あなたが笑っている それだけで笑顔になる
subtitles.english: Soft and fluffy, when you are smiling, just that makes me smile.

subtitles.original: 神様ありがとう 運命のいたずらでも
subtitles.english: Thank you, God, even if it's a prank of fate.

subtitles.original: めぐり逢えたことが 幸せなの
subtitles.english: I'm happy just for the fact that we were able to meet.

subtitles.original: でも そんなんじゃだめ
subtitles.english: But that's not good.

subtitles.original: もう そんなんじゃほら
subtitles.english: Look, that's already no good.

subtitles.original: 心は進化するよ もっともっと
subtitles.english: My heart will evolve, more and more.

subtitles.original: そう そんなんじゃやだ
subtitles.english: Yes, I don't want it to be like that.

subtitles.original: ねぇ そんなんじゃまだ
subtitles.english: Hey, it's not enough like that.

subtitles.original: 私のこと見ててね ずっとずっと
subtitles.english: Please keep looking at me, forever and ever.

subtitles.original: 私の中のあなたほど あなたの中の私の存在は まだまだ大きくないこともわかってるけれど
subtitles.english: I know that my existence in you is not yet as large as yours in me, but...

subtitles.original: 今この同じ瞬間 共有してる実感
subtitles.english: The feeling of sharing this same moment right now.

subtitles.original: 塵も積もればやまとなでしこ？ 略してちりつもやまとなでこ！
subtitles.english: If dust piles up, will it become a Yamato Nadeshiko? Abbreviated as Chiritsumo Yamato Nadeko!

subtitles.original: くらくらり くらくらる あなたを見上げたら それだけで眩しすぎて
subtitles.english: Dizzy and spinning, when I look up at you, just that is too dazzling.

subtitles.original: くらくらる くらくらり あなたを想っている それだけで溶けてしまう
subtitles.english: Spinning and dizzy, when I think of you, just that makes me melt away.

subtitles.original: 神様ありがとう 運命のいたずらでも
subtitles.english: Thank you, God, even if it's a prank of fate.

subtitles.original: めぐり逢えたことが 幸せなの
subtitles.english: I'm happy just for the fact that we were able to meet.

subtitles.original: 恋する季節は 欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: The season of love is a greedy circulation.

subtitles.original: 恋する気持ちは 欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: The feeling of love is a greedy circulation.

subtitles.original: 恋する瞳は 欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: The eyes in love are a greedy circulation.

subtitles.original: 恋する乙女は 欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: A maiden in love is a greedy circulation.

subtitles.original: ふわふわり ふわふわる あなたが名前を呼ぶ それだけで宙へ浮かぶ
subtitles.english: Fluffy and soft, when you call my name, just that makes me float into the air.

subtitles.original: ふわふわる ふわふわり あなたが笑っている それだけで笑顔になる
subtitles.english: Soft and fluffy, when you are smiling, just that makes me smile.

subtitles.original: 神様ありがとう 運命のいたずらでも
subtitles.english: Thank you, God, even if it's a prank of fate.

subtitles.original: めぐり逢えたことが 幸せなの
subtitles.english: I'm happy just for the fact that we were able to meet.
